Package view.changeAppearence.Interface

Class AppearenceHandler

java.lang.Object
view.changeAppearence.Interface.AppearenceHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
BorderPaneAppearenceHandler, ButtonAppearenceHandler, CheckBoxAppearenceHandler, GridPaneAppearenceHandler, HBoxAppearenceHandler, HyperLinkAppearenceHandler, ImageViewAppearenceHandler, LabelAppearenceHandler, MenuAppearenceHandler, MenuBarAppearenceHandler, MenuItemAppearenceHandler, PasswordFieldAppearenceHandler, RadioButtonAppearenceHandler, ScrollPaneAppearenceHandler, SliderAppearenceHandler, TextAppearenceHandler, TextAreaAppearenceHandler, TextFieldAppearenceHandler, VBoxAppearenceHandler
public abstract class AppearenceHandler extends Object
Classe abstrata que define o contrato para os manipuladores de aparência dos elementos do JavaFX.
